title: Asian salmon wrap
ingredients: ['2 spring onions, chopped', '5 tablespoons thinly julienned mooli (daikon) radish', '5 tablespoons chopped cucumber', '1 tablespoon rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon wasabi paste', '1/8 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 flour tortilla wraps', '175g cooked white rice', '175g tinned salmon, drained', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds']
